name: Ōkinoko Goraku (Games)
description: A new collection of on-chain games!

functions.description: Eat the food to grow longer, but avoid running into yourself or the walls. Watch out for the power-ups that let you pass through walls! Do not forget - in every game, there is a high score to beat and a chance to win the season prize!
Stack blocks and clear lines! Just like the classic game we all know but with another name and a season prize pot!

functions.name: buy_tokens
functions.description: Purchase game tokens with HIVE. Each HIVE equals one token.

parameters.name: Token Amount
parameters.hintText: Number of tokens to purchase (1 HIVE = 1 token)

parameters.name: Payment
parameters.hintText: Amount of HIVE to spend on tokens

functions.name: host_event
functions.description: Create a new gaming event with a prize pool. Select which games are included and set the event parameters.

parameters.name: Burn Percent
parameters.hintText: Percentage of prize pool to burn (0-50%)

parameters.name: Games
parameters.hintText: Pick the games you want to include in this event.

parameters.name: Prize Pool
parameters.hintText: Initial HIVE amount for the prize pool. Other users can contribute later.

functions.hintText: Events allow players to compete for a shared prize pool across selected games.
